content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The institutional cooperation of Tempulli with higher education institutions and other professional institutions has been one of the priorities of the Tempulli’s development in recent years.

The institutional cooperation of Tempulli in almost all cases has been supplemented with relevant Cooperation Agreements providing for areas and ways of cooperation. This collaboration includes joint research projects, shared equipment utilization and collaborative development strategies.

It is worth mentioning that the cooperation with business and industry has started especially since the autumn of 2019.

Tempulli collaborates with various organizations to pursue teaching, service and commercial activities in the public and private sectors, with government, local and international communities.

Cooperation Agreements with institutions and local companies:

  • Cooperation agreement with the Association of Kosovo Municipalities;
  • Cooperation agreement with Prishtina International Airport;
  • Cooperation agreement with “INKOS” Institute;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Ministry of Education, Science and Technology;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Ministry of Transport and Communications of Kosovo;
  • Cooperation Agreement with the Kosovo Customs Service;
  • Cooperation Agreement with Kosovo Railways;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Trepca Metallurgical Company;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Municipality of Pristina, respectively with the Municipal Enterprise “Urban Traffic”;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Mechanical High School “Shtjefën Gjeqovi”;
  • Cooperation agreement with the company “Autokaçandolli” which is legal representatives as authorized diler of companies “Yamaha” and “Suzuki”;
  • Cooperation agreement with the legal representative of the “Philips” company “Simena”;
  • Cooperation agreement with Kosovo Police;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Kosovo Chamber of Commerce;
  • Cooperation agreement with Kosovo Postal Office;
  • Cooperation Agreement with Kosovo Customs Service;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Kosovo Electro technical Association;
  • Cooperation agreement with Pristina International Airport “Adem Jashari”;
  • Cooperation Agreement with the Ministry of Kosovo Security Force;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Railway Regulatory Authority;
  • Cooperation agreement with Kosovo Energy Corporation “KEDS”;
  • Cooperation agreement with “Electra” LL.C.;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Kosovo Standardization Agency (KAS), Ministry of Trade and Industry;
  • Cooperation Agreement between the Kosovo Security Bureau and the Kosovo Motorization Association;
  • Cooperation Agreement with Faculty of Sport Education of the Public University of Pristina “Hasan Pristina”, Pristina, Kosovo;
  • Cooperation mobility Agreement L’Quila Company SH.P.K. Pristina, Kosovo;

 

Cooperation agreements with international institutions/companies:

  • Cooperation agreement with the University of Žilina, Faculty of Management and Information Technology, Žilina, Slovakia;
  • Cooperation agreement with the French organization Atlas Logistique, Paris, France;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Technical University of Berlin, Institute of Water and Road Transport System, Berlin, Germany;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Technical University of Dresden, Germany;
  • Cooperation agreement with the University of Sarajevo respectively the Faculty of Traffic and Communications, Sarajevo, BH;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Ministry of Public Works, Transport and Telecommunication respectively the Institute of Transport in Tirana, Albania;
  • Cooperation agreement with Connect South East Association – Austria;
  • Cooperation agreement with European Road Stars Academy, Brussels, Belgium;
  • Cooperation agreement with Politecnica Ingegneria ed Architettura, Modena, Italy;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Sapienza University of Rome (Transport and Logistics Research Center), Italy;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Faculty of Technical Sciences of UKLO University St. Climent Ohridski, Bitola, North Macedonia;
  • Cooperation agreement with the “Alexander Moisiu” University, Durres, Albania;
  • Cooperation agreement with CILT(The Chartered Institute for Logistics and Transport, London, UK;
  • Cooperation agreement with the University of Zagreb, Faculty of Transport and Traffic Sciences, Zagreb, Croatia;
  • Cooperation agreement with the Ayvansaray University of Istanbul, Turkey;
  • Cooperation agreement with TUV Albania -Austria.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
